mapper.sql: demand_id, item_id, unit_id, `count`, org_id, bath_id, is_meet, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select: select bd.demand_id, bd.item_id, bd.unit_id, bd.`count`, bd.org_id, bd.bath_id, bd.is_meet, bd.create_by, bd.create_time, bd.update_by, bd.update_time, bi.item_name, bi.item_description, bu.unit_name, bb.path_name from b_demand bd LEFT JOIN b_item bi ON bi.item_id = bd.item_id LEFT JOIN b_unit bu ON bu.unit_id = bd.unit_id LEFT JOIN b_bath bb ON bb.bath_id = bd.bath_id LEFT JOIN s_user su ON su.org_id = bd.org_id where su.user_id = #{userId} and bd.bath_id = #{bathId} order by bd.create_time desc
